full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 145 of 262 1856 LC8Cmax5 Rodgers - direct 1 MS. COMEY: Ms. Drescher, would you please pull up what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 113. 2 Q. Mr. Rodgers, do you recognize the person in that photograph? 3 A. Yes, that's Virginia Roberts. 4 MS. COMEY: We can take that down. Thank you, 5 Ms. Drescher. 6 Q. I'd like to go now, staying on page 78, down to flight 7 1434. What's the date of this flight? 8 A. This is December the 14th, 2000. 9 Q. And again, we're in Government Exhibit 662. Where were you 10 flying from and where were you flying to? 11 A. Teterboro, New Jersey, to St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands. 12 Q. What does TIST stand for? 13 A. That's the airport identifier for the St. Thomas airport. 14 Q. When you flew Jeffrey Epstein to that airport, what was 15 your understanding of where he was staying? 16 A. He owned an island that was nearby. 17 Q. Was Jeffrey Epstein a passenger on this flight? 18 A. Yes. 19 Q. Was Ghislaine Maxwell a passenger on this flight? 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. Was Virginia Roberts a passenger on this flight? 22 A. Yes. 23 Q. Was there also one other passenger? 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00019007
